Description: On I-66 at mile marker 63 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On VA-150 in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of the ramp from Rt. 651, motorists can expect delays due to standing water. The south left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Weather Incident - Standing Water - Advisory

Description: On US- 60W in the City of Norfolk, near 15th View gate, motorists can expect potential delays due to an incident. The west entrance ramp is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Other Traffic

Description: On VA-150 in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of the ramp from Rt. 651, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
